title: $2199 -- Budapest, Vienna, Prague, Helsinki: 9-Nt. Vacations
text:
Home > Vacation Package Deals > $2199 -- Budapest, Vienna, Prague, Helsinki: 9-Nt. Vacations $2199 -- Budapest, Vienna, Prague, Helsinki: 9-Nt. Vacations   - October 8, 2015 at 1:56 PM Tweet 
Visit four of Europe's most enchanting citiesâ€”Budapest, Vienna, Prague, and Helsinki. The smarTours "Budapest, Vienna & Budapest" vacation package from $2,199 includes round-trip airfare, luxury accommodations in all four cities, intra-Europe ground transport, most meals, guided tours, and taxes and fees. 
This deal includes: Round-trip airfare from New York City; other departure cities are available at varying rates Three nights' accommodations in Budapest Two nights' accommodations in Vienna Three nights' accommodations in Prague One night's accommodations in Helsinki Airline taxes and fuel surcharges Intra-Europe ground transportation Attractions' admission fees 11 meals 
How to get this deal: Visit smarTours ' website. Travel at these rates is valid from New York City during various dates between April and November 2016, and when booking by October 29, 2015. Reserve after then and prices start at $2,599. 
Don't forget: Always compare prices from multiple travel providers to make sure that you're getting the best price with this deal. Find Cheap Flights!
